Cleanse is sodium lauryl sulfate free since uses soothing, natural kiwi and kumquat derivatives to purify the skin. The end result is refreshed, hydrated and radiant skin.

Kiwi Kumquat Surfactant Blend: Gentle cleansing agent that effectively removes impurities and allows us to avoid the use of harsh/toxic ingredients like sodium lauryl sulfate.
 
Benefits
Universal facial cleanser
Gently removes dirt, makeup and environmental toxins
Sodium Lauryl Sulfate FREE, Paraben FREE
 
Skin Types and Conditions
Aging Skin
Sensitive Skin
Dry Skin
All Skin Types

Apply to damp skin and massage for 60 seconds. Rinse thoroughly with warm tepid water. Can be used both morning and evening.

Rehydrating Skin Conditioner & Penetration Enhancer (120ml)

This lovely spritz aids in product penetration through Osmosis: diffusion of water from an area of high concentration to an area of low concentration. Spray on this frequency enhanced water to heal, rejuvenate and further drive products into the skin.

Universal facial conditioner
Enhances product penetration
Promotes younger, clearer skin

Skin Types and Conditions
Aging, wound healing and blemishes.
All Skin Types

Spray directly onto skin (about 4 pumps is enough) immediately after cleansing as well as following application of serums to help aid in absorption. Use to add 'slip' to product and help penetrate the ingredients of masks and Facial Infusion while performing treatments. Can be used at any point throughout the day to hydrate and reduce bacteria buildup on the skin's surface. Fabulous for teenage acne also.

Ingredients
Harmonized water enhanced with epidermal growth factor, keratinocyte growth factor, antibacterial, anti-fungal and anti-viral frequencies.

name: Blemish/Oily Kit
description:
Blemish/Oily Kit
 	
Deep Clean, Clear, Clarify, Acne Blend, Anti-Pathogen Harmonized H20

Deep Clean :: Apply 2-4 pumps in AM and PM, lather and rinse well.
Effectively removes dirt and pollutants while minimizing the loss of protective lipids.

Clear :: Apply 5-10 sprays to face after cleansing, and 3-5 sprays after serum application to help massage products into skin.
This frequency enhanced water balances the cells and repairs the systems in your skin so that they function perfectly.

Clarify :: Apply 1-2 pumps after Clear application.
A potent serum designed to calm, clear and address scarring while normalizing oil and restoring skin health.

Acne Blend :: Mix 1 scoop into Clarify twice a day and apply.
This powerful blend is effective at tackling the tough acne (ie. cysts) and other stubborn cases. It promotes healing while reducing bacteria and calming inflammation.

Anti-Pathogen Harmonized H20™ :: Take 2ml twice daily (preferably with 2+ oz of water).
Can treat the internal fungi and bacteria that contributes to the cause of acne and inflammation.

name: Catalyst Transformation Serum
description:
Catalyst
Skin Restoration and DNA Repair Serum
Catalyst uses Zinc Finger Technology™ (ZFT) to repair DNA damage and assist in the production of proteins and antioxidants within the cell. SRGF-7™ is a patented combination of amino acids and key co-factors that improve wound healing, lighten pigmentation, reduce visible capillaries, and stimulate collagen and elastin production through a revolutionary process. 

	Les Nouvelles Esthétiques & Spa | LNE & Spa BEST 2013
Best Hyperpigmentation Treatment

Key Ingredients
    	L-Ascorbic Acid (Vitamin C): Water soluble Vitamin C; triggers the amino acids to strengthen collagen and assist in brightening and smoothing the skin.

L-Lysine: Essential amino acid needed to build protein and proper collagen formation.

L-Proline: Amino acid with moisturizing and moisture retention properties; improves skin texture, aids in collagen formation, repairs damaged tissue and promotes health of connective tissue.

Glycine: Amino acid that helps remove toxic substances and provide a release of growth hormones; promotes cell volumizing through hydration & participates in several important reactions in the body.

Copper Gluconate: Stimulates skin regeneration, helps rebuild collagen and elastin and accelerates wound repair.

Zinc Gluconate: Essential mineral that plays a role in the proper function of the immune system and in skin metabolism and repair; creates zinc finger formation with amino acids.

Benefits
Repair DNA damage and
Rebuild collagen
Provide sun protection
Pigment control and normalization
Heal 'broken' capillaries
Prevent scarring
Improve skin health

Skin Types and Conditions
    	 For all skin types.

Directions
    	 Shake bottle. Apply 8-10 drops in combination with an Active 'A' serum or in combination with StemFactor. May also be applied to cleansed skin before application of Facial Infusion. *Product may darken after being opened due to the form of Vitamin C. This does not affect its efficacy.

Testimonials
    	 "Wanted you to know how above exceptional the Catalyst is in stopping the horrible outbreak of Herpes on the face. I have had this happen during times of stress all my life. Nothing has actually stopped the blisters from running their course usually 7-10 days. When applied at the first sign of redness and awareness that it's back, it will hold back the swelling 80% and the blisters do not run their course but are stopped immediately and in three days are basically gone. Usually there is another 7 or more days of redness after the blisters are gone. Now there are no signs of it being there after 4 days total! This is short of a miracle! After a lifelong occurrence of this what a blessing to find something that is victorious over this disgusting virus. Thank you so much for making this product, never stop making it." 

Esthetician Marianne Kehoe, has worked with thousands of clients and numerous products for more than 20 years. "Between Catalyst and StemFactor, the results I’m seeing in my practice are phenomenal, repeatedly,” according to Kehoe, “including with post-operative scars and people who have been exposed to the California sun for years."

Ingredients
    	 Aqua (Water), Propanediol, Ascorbic Acid (L), Glycine, Proline (L), Lysine HCI (L), Copper Gluconate, Zinc Gluconate, Hydrated Silica

name: Second Skin Crush Loose Minerals Foundation
description:
Works like a second skin. It is a foundation, sunscreen and concealer in one product. Formulated with the purest blend of earth minerals Synergie’s loose minerals offer flawless coverage, broad spectrum sun protection and is a true extension of your skin care routine. Your skin will appear luminous with superior lasting cover. The anti-inflammatory properties of zinc oxide makes our loose minerals perfect for acne and irritated skin.
Suitable for all skin types and tones, Synergie minerals provides either a silky sheer veil of cover with a single layer, or a more opaque ‘photo-shoot’ look with several layers. The Kabuki brush ensures even coverage.  A quick spray with Hydrosprtiz and the minerals are set for the day.

Application Technique: 
Always apply loose minerals in thin layers.  One light layer will provide an even, fresh look.  Two layers is usually perfect for lasting, all day coverage.  Ensure your Synergie moisturiser has fully absorbed before applying Synergie Minerals Second Skin Crush.
	1.  Place your minerals on a clean tissue.  Open the jar and tap minerals through the sifter into the empty lid.  Two or three taps should release sufficient minerals for one layer of foundation.
	2.  Firmly push the kabuki brush into the minerals and rotate the brush a few times to evenly distribute the minerals on the brush.
	3.  Now turn the brush up (flat base facing down) and tap the base firmly on the bathroom bench 3 times.  This allows the minerals to penetrate the brush so they are not sitting on the top.
	4.  Polish the minerals into the skin with the kabuki brush, using small, firm, circular buffing motions.   Work minerals into the skin quickly and evenly, without spending too long on one area of the face.  Don’t forget the neck and décolletage!

name: A Moment In Time Stunning Boxed Candles
description:
Introducing Elume's fragrant jar candle range, 'A Moment in Time', where beautiful scents mix to evoke memories from a summer's day at the beach to a romantic afternoon wandering through Paris. This sensuous new range is geared towards reliving those meaningful experiences while relaxing in the soft, moody glow that each candle bestows.

Each box is lusciously wrapped in the evocative photography of artist Irene Suchocki, visually translating the mood of the fragrance within and perhaps even inspiring future wanderings.

Each candle burns for approximately 80 hours and is made from a soy wax blend.

Available in the fragrances below:

Le Printemps - fresh lime blossom
Springtime air in Paris, when fresh and delicate lime blossom scents stir love in the unwary traveller's heart. Awaken the senses with this romantic and invigorating floral citrus bouquet.


Looking for Love - peony, lily and rose
Wandering aimlessly through the backstreets of Paris; a glorious floral bouquet with enchanting fruity and feminine notes of pink grapefruit & mandarin turns the head. The endless romance of the rose is captured with a hint of vanilla & musk, heightening the senses & stirring the heart.

1000 Lanterns - ginger, lemon and vanilla
Brightly hued lanterns sway softly in a breeze that carries an invigorating aroma of ginger and lemon. Walking on, leaves rustle and a hint of vanilla wafts by, soothing the soul.

Sunshiny Day - coconut, lime and vanilla
A relaxing sea breeze hovers gently as the playful scent of coconut conjures a sultry summer's day on the beach. The sweet smell of lime and vanilla engenders a sense of warmth and tranquillity as it drifts in the salty ocean air.

Swing Set - fairy floss
Lights sparkle and laughter bubbles forth. A captivating and festive aroma with a blend of coconut, petitgrain, vanilla and sweet musks conjures memories of carefree days and the exuberance of youth.

When in Venice - mandarin cassis
Drifting on the quiet waters of mystical Venice an aroma of freshly juiced mandarin and yellow grapefruit swirls down from an open window. Invigorating and enchanting, this inspirational scent with hints of velvety neroli petals and smooth vanilla bean, conjures the beauty and livery of the floating city.

A Stroll in Manhattan - orange flower and jasmine
Turning the corner a delightful and peaceful scene of newly budded orange blossom creates an oasis of calm within this vibrant city. A hint of freshly picked herbs and green mint leaf combined with citron zest and clementine adds to the scent of the dewy florals relaxing and soothing the senses.

Candy Apple - toffee apple
Wandering wide-eyed through the fair the delicious scent of green apple and sweet candy accompanies bright neon and flashy music to quicken the pulse. A fruit medley of pineapple, banana and orange on a sweet base of spicy nutmeg and almond perfectly sets the scene for festivity and adventure.

options.name: Looking for Love - peony, lily and rose

A Stroll in Manhattan - orange flower and jasmine

    	 Apply 2-4 pumps AM and PM to a wet face. Lather and rinse.

Ingredients
    	 Aqua (Harmonized Water), Kiwi Surfactant Blend, Lavendula Angustifolia (Lavender) Oil, Peppermint (Mentha Piperita) Oil, Guar Gum, Sodium Chloride, Glyceryl Stearate SE, Deyhdroacetic Acid (and) Benzyl Alcohol, Preservative Water, Citric Acid

name: Daily Moisturiser Sunscreen - Uberzinc 50ml
description:
A recent technological breakthrough called micronisation has enabled the natural mineral zinc oxide (i.e. traditional thick white Zinc Cream) to be finely ground into tiny particles that are invisible to the naked eye and appear clear when applied to the skin.
These new invisible Zinc Oxide Sun blocks are termed physical sunscreens as they physically sit on top of the skin and reflect ALL UV light- both UVA and UVB to give full protection from burning, photo ageing and potential skin cancer.
Compare this to the common chemical absorbing sunscreens, which absorb into the skin- many of which are found in the urine just hours later! The following are examples of common chemical sunscreen ingredients in many commercially available sunscreens:
• Octyl methoxycinnamate
• Butyl methoxydibenzoylmethane
• Oxybenzone
• Benzophenone
Synergie Űberzinc Essential Daily Moisturiser is suitable for all skin types, offering broad spectrum protection in a light natural base.
Apply daily (following Vitamin B Serum/Pure C Crystals). Űberzinc is an excellent base for Synergie Minerals foundations. Reapply following swimming or sporting activities. May also be used in the evening as a light moisturiser, particularly for irritated, sensitive or acneic skin.

name: Vitamin C Serum - Suprema 30ml
description:
Until recently the benefits of Vitamin C have been underutilised. This is due to the instability of L-ascorbic acid (Vitamin C) in water based serums. Cosmeceutical formulators have been unable to make full use of L-ascorbic acid serums for:
• collagen stimulation
• skin lightening
• neutralising free radicals
AM: Apply 1 to 2 drops to face and neck area and gently massage until fully absorbed. Recommended for use under Uberzinc due to their complementary UV protective properties. PM: May also be applied in the evening as needed.

name: Vitamin A Serum - Ultimate
description:
To renew the skin and reverse the signs of ageing from UV damage, 2 areas must be stimulated:
• the cells that produce collagen and elastin (fibroblasts)
• optimal blood flow to the skin
Collagen and elastin are critical to repairing the skin. In addition, the skin’s repair capabilities and appearance are totally dependent on nutrients, antioxidants and immune support from its blood supply. The more blood supply, the better the health of the skin.
The unique ingredients in Ultimate A work better on these tissues than any other ingredients or other forms of Vitamin A on the market. Retinol Molecular is the most active, stable and gentle form of Vitamin A available without prescription. Retin A, used in many other Vitamin A preparations, can be as effective but is also irritating to the skin. In contrast, Retinol Molecular is extremely active and penetrative, addressing skin concerns without the irritation.
Apply one pump every evening on face and neck prior to moisturising. For optimal penetration, combine with home needling device.

name: Anti-Ageing Moisturiser - Reclaim 50ml
description:
Synergie Practitioner Reclaim is a potent blend of antioxidants, peptides and other leading edge cosmeceuticals designed to minimise fine lines and restore ageing skin.
May be used either AM or PM. AM: Apply 1 pump following application of Vitamin B Serum and Pure C Crystals. Follow with Synergie MineralsTM makeup for effective sun protection. PM: Apply 1 pump as the final step in your evening routine. Allow at least 5 minutes for other actives to fully penetrate before application.

name: Eye Treatment Serum- Revitaleyes 10ml
description:
Revitaleyes serum has been specifically formulated to renew the delicate skin around the eye area, reducing dark circles, puffiness and fine lines. Its potent blend of tetrapeptides, antioxidants and collagen stimulators has substantial research supporting its reparative effectiveness.
Roll on a single layer to the upper and lower eye areas morning and night.

name: Pure L-ascorbic Acid Crystals 3.5g
description:
Synergie Skin™ is now able to offer a product containing the highest pharmaceutical grade pure Vitamin C available – 100% pure L-ascorbic acid crystals.
Best applied in the morning to help protect cells from UV free radical damage (please note Vitamin C is NOT as sunscreen).Cleanse and dissolve 10-20% Vitamin C crystals with 80-90% Hydrogel (or Prepare Astringent for more congested skin). Press firmly into face and neck.

name: Cleansing Milk/Eye MakeUp Remover
description:
A good cleanser is designed to gently remove surface pollution, cell debris and makeup without over exfoliating or stripping the skin of natural oils. It should also be balanced to work in synergy with the acid mantle of the skin.
It is not necessary to incorporate active ingredients or AHAs in cleansers. A cleanser is only in contact with the skin for less than a minute. It is therefore unnecessary to use a cleanser for a particular skin type. All cleansers should perform the same function on all skins ‐to cleanse!
Cleansing Milk is a low foaming lotion and is specifically designed for fragile, highly sensitive skin types. It contains gentle pure ingredients and is 100% free of sodium laureth sulphate, parabens, artificial fragrance and artificial colours. The subtle rose fragrance is derived from the highest quality pure essential oils and will not irritate sensitive skin.
Synergie Skin Cleansing Milk is also ideal for removing eye make‐up and non waterproof mascara.
Use morning and at night prior to using your active ingredients. Use sparingly, preferably with a small quantity of water.

name: MineralWhip Foundation
description:
Mineralwhip antioxidant cream foundation provides long lasting flawless coverage, with high UV protection and cosmeceutical ingredients that benefit the skin throughout the day. 
The combination of key ingredients including Zinc Oxide, Beta Glucan, Sea Buckthorn oil, Gotu Kola and Rose Hip oil help stimulate collagen production, promote healing and contain antioxidants to reverse free radical cell damage. The product contains natural minerals and botanicals without any potentially harmful additives. This exceptional foundation comes in six exotic shades which can be simply applied to the skin with the Synergie Minerals foundation brush. The result is flawless results that actually benefit the skin.

Comes in 6 coffee inspired colours!

Vanilla Cream
Latte
Cappuccino
Mocha
Espresso
Cocoa

name: Kabuki & Pouch
description:
Use to apply Second Skin Crush, loose minerals foundation.
This super soft Kabuki is vegan (no animal hair) and allows the loose minerals to glide onto the skin. This brush washes like a dream and dries overnight. Use mild shampoo and hold brush with the bristles facing down  when washing to avoid too much product getting into the base of the brush. Hint: The kabuki bag is great if you want to touch up during the day. Just preload your kabuki with minerals and touch up when needed!

name: Hydrospritz
description: Fortified with a synergistic blend of potent antioxidants such as green tea, apple extract and pomegranate, Hydrospritz does two jobs in one. It is both a setting agent for the loose mineral foundation and a powerful skin care product. It draws moisture into the skin and infuses anti ageing and free radical fighting ingredients throughout the day.

name: Eyebrite Under Eye Camouflage
description: Apricot tone instantly neutralises dark circles with one light layer. Applied with the concealer brush, this light cream formula contains sea buckthorn oil to nurture the delicate skin around the eyes.

name: Liquid Lift Serum 25mls
description:
An 8 hour facelift and long term skin hydration in one serum. Formulated with pure botanical concentrates, Hyaluronic acid and ceramides, Liquid Lift is ideal to freshen the face and neck every day or for that special evening event.
Apply sparingly to lightly moisturised face & eye area. Allow to activate for 3 minutes. Apply loose mineral makeup.

name: Exfoliate - Mineral Microderm Scrub 30g
description:
Synergie Mineral Microderm Scrub contains the key ingredient Corundum (Aluminium Oxide). This natural earth mineral is the same crystal used in clinical microdermabrasion machines.
Synergie Skin™ Mineral Microderm Scrub has been formulated to gently but effectively remove surface dead skin, congestion and blackheads.
Use 1 to 3 times per week on congested areas. Apply to damp skin and massage gently in small circular motions for approximately 1 minute. Rinse off with tepid water or during showering for ease of removal of the crystals. Follow with active ingredients as directed by your skin care professional.

name: Enlighten+ Serum 15ml
description:
Synergie Skin Enlighten+ Serum offers the most effective and natural method to combat uneven skin tone and skin discolouration due to UV sun damage.This hydroquinone‐free formulation harnesses the clinically proven benefits of Azeloglycina, Chromabright and Vitamin B3. Clinical data shows that Chromabright is more effective than Arbutin
and Kojic acid for addressing skin pigmentation concerns.
These and other key ingredients work in synergy to brighten and whiten then skin.
Apply PM to affected areas following Vitamin A serum. May also be used on the neck and chest.

name: Hydrogel - Oil Free Hydrator 50ml
description:
All skin types require daily hydration. Hydrogel is an oil free moisturising gel and has been specifically designed for skin which is prone to oiliness and congestion. It is also recommended for skin exposed to environmental conditions with high humidity and is an excellent skin primer prior to Synergie Minerals application.
May be used AM prior to Synergie Minerals and PM following Reveal and Ultimate A serum.

name: Vitamin B Serum 30ml
description:
Synergie Skin™ Vitamin B Serum contains Niacinamide (Vitamin B3), the latest ingredient hailed by skin professionals to rejuvenate and strengthen skin against a broad range of skin conditions such as dryness, pigmentation and excess sebum. It is thought of as the great ‘multitasking’ cosmecuetical.
Synergie Skin Vitamin B Active serum is recommended for evening use, following application of Ultimate A serum. Apply one pump to face and neck, accompanied with the Rejuvaderm home roller. Vitamin B serum is also recommended following clinical skin treatments where skin may be irritated.

name: Teeth Whiter Brighter  -Rejuvedent 20g
description:
Healthy, beautiful teeth and gums are as desirable as beautiful skin. As we age, just like skin, extra attention is needed. Rejuvedent contains ingredients which:
 contain natural whitening agents
 control gum bleeding
 absorb bacteria that causes decay
 are soothing and anti inflammatory
 prevent gum atrophy and recession
 are potent antioxidants
 repair gum tissue
 retard loss of tooth enamel
All ingredients have been included for their anti inflammatory, antioxidant benefits and cosmetic benefits of gentle polishing and peroxide free whitening for beautiful, healthy teeth and gums.
Squeeze a small amount of toothpaste onto your toothbrush. Dip into the Rejuvedent powder liberally coating the surface of the paste. Brush thoroughly twice daily. Note: results may be enhanced by not thoroughly rinsing, but leaving the product residue in your mouth overnight. Please note: Rejuvedent is NOT a substitute for toothpaste. It is a complimentary treatment that works ‘in synergy’ with your existing dental care regime.

name: Gentle Cleanser
description:
A good cleanser is designed to gently remove surface pollution, cell debris and makeup without over exfoliating or stripping the skin of natural oils. It should also be balanced to work in synergy with the acid mantle of the skin.
It is not necessary to incorporate active ingredients or AHAs in cleansers. Creamy ‘tissue-off’ cleansers are not recommended as they leave a residue on the skin surface which may prevent penetration of your active skin care ingredients (such as Vitamin B, C and A).
A cleanser is only in contact with the skin for less than a minute. It is therefore unnecessary to use a cleanser for a particular skin type as they should all perform the same function on all skins.
Synergie rinse-off foaming cleanser is ideal for all skin types. It contains only pure ingredients and is 100% free of sodium laureth sulphate, parabens, artificial fragrance and artificial colours. The invigorating Neroli fragrance is derived from the highest quality pure essential oils and will not irritate sensitive skin.
Synergie Skin Gentle Cleanser is also ideal for removing eye make-up and non waterproof mascara. Furthermore, it is a gel concentrate so it will last twice as long as conventional cleansers.
Use in the morning and at night prior to using your active ingredients. Use only a pea sized amount.

name: Moisturiser Hydrolock 30g
description:
Human skin is subjected to a multitude of environmental stressors such as UV light, wind, humidity and pollution. As our skin ages or is subjected to environmental extremes, additional hydration and repair is needed to replenish the skin and restore surface moisture.
Hydrolock contains rich, natural moisturisers combined with the cutting edge repair ingredient Phycosaccharide A1 which programs the cells to produce vital growth factors and enzymes needed to product healthy luminous skin.
Recommended for skin that is particularly dry and dehydrated.
Application: Hydrolock may be used as a rich night moisturiser or as an intense hydrator for dehydrated skin.

name: Uberzinc Body Protective Moisturiser 100ml
description:
This formula provides protection and hydration for all body areas exposed to UV light. Unlike traditional natural sun protectors, Uberzinc body feels like a luxurious, non-greasy and deeply hydrating hand and body lotion.
 
Key ingredients and benefits:
- 21% natural zinc oxide to protect your skin from damaging UVA/B rays. Zinc oxide is a powerful anti inflammatory as well as a UV protector.
- Vitamin D3 to help replenish reduced Vitamin D3 levels that may be depleted from avoiding sun exposure. Synergies’ liquid Vitamin D3 (cholecalciferol) is readily absorbed into the skin and is more bioavailable than powdered forms. According to a recently published medical study, Vitamin D3 helped with skin conditions because due to its anti-inflammatory properties. In the study, vitamin D3 was given to patients with psoriasis. Within 1 month, the condition disappeared. It was then given to patients with lichen planus lesions. Vitamin D3 relieved skin itching and regressed the lesions by half. The researchers then gave Vitamin D3 to those with photodermatitis. The lesions from the disorder disappeared within a month.
- Natural Green tea extract neutralises free radical UV damage. Green tea extract is a skin anti-inflammatory and exhibits an inhibitory action on collagenase (an enzyme that breaks down collagen). Topical application of green tea helps to promote the health and quantity of collagen, thereby maintaining a firm and elastic skin. A recent clinical study has shown that the skin had measurably more elastic tissue content after continuous application of a green tea extract. Green tea extract appears to exert a sun protective effect by quenching free radicals and reducing inflammation induced by UV light. This is why Synergie has added pure green tea to Uberzinc. It is best to combine green tea extract with zinc oxide-based sunscreens because zinc oxide is chemically inert and should not react with green tea extract.
-Australian Lemon Myrtle pure essential oil adds an invigorating twist. Apart from being a wonderful mood lifter, it is one of the most antiseptic, antiviral and antifungal of the Australian essential oils (more powerful than tea tree oil)
Application:Apply to hands and body prior to UV exposure. Reapply if perspiring excessively or wiping the body. Reapplication at two hourly intervals is advisable in extreme heat or humidity. Zinc oxide provides physical UV protection. Do not rub into the skin excessively. Not recommended as a facial UV moisturiser and UV protector.

name: Natural Brush Cleaner
description:
100% natural ingredients in a quick dry formula.
Spray into a tissue then pat the brush gentle to remove makeup.
100ml

name: B-Juvenate Body Moisturising Treatment
description: Synergie Skin™ B-Juvenate contains 8% pure Niacinamide in a natural nourishing moisturiser. Niacinamide boosts the skin’s immunity, reduces uneven skin tone, increases hydration and improves skin texture. B-Juvenate is a total body treatment, delivering results usually only offered by the very best facial products.

name: Prepair - Vitamin C Activator
description:
Prepare is particularly suited to skin types exhibiting excess oil or thickened, sun damaged skin.
One of the primary reasons that cosmeceuticals, peels and other active ingredients fail to penetrate is due to surface oil which acts as a physical barrier to absorption.
Prepare acts as a mild astringent to remove excess oil with the added botanical benefits of Witch Hazel, Aloe Vera, Chlorophyll and Citric Acid.
Apply prior to active ingredients. Spray onto 4x4 gauze pads and wipe gently over the face, paying particular attention to oily areas. Avoid eye and lip areas.

name: Acne Management Formular - BlemX
description:
Acne is a chronic inflammatory condition involving:
• Over production of skin cells which are trapped in the pores.
• Increased oil production by sebaceous glands
• Excess P.acnes bacteria present in the pores
• Skin inflammation as a result of the bacterial assault on living cells
Most acne products only address one of these factors. Synergie is able to address all 4 contributing factors in one formulation.
Apply to affected areas following Vitamin A. May be used twice daily if advised by your skin professional.

name: Professional Brushes Set OR Individual
description:
1. Essential Kabuki Brush
Use to apply Second Skin Crush, loose minerals foundation.
This super soft Kabuki is vegan (no animal hair) and allows the loose minerals to glide onto the skin. This brush washes like a dream and dries overnight. Use mild shampoo and hold brush with the bristles facing down  when washing to avoid too much product getting into the base of the brush. Hint: The kabuki bag is great if you want to touch up during the day. Just preload your kabuki with minerals and touch up when needed!

2. Foundation Brush
Used for flawless application of our Mineralwhip antioxidant cream foundation. It is designed to be used in a swirling motion (like using the kabuki) to create a flawless, streak free finish. Remember to work in sections of the face rather than in large areas all at once.

3. Blusher Brush
This brush is ideal for application of mineral Blushcrush.

4. Large Concealer Brush
This brush is amazing for concealing larger areas.

5. Small Concealer Brush
Designed to camouflage and conceal small areas and blemishes. Use to apply Eyebrite concealer.

6. Eyeshadow Crease Brush
This brush is best used for applying the darker eyeshadow tones.

7. All Over Eyeshadow Brush
Use to apply the base colour eyeshadow.

8. Dual EyeShadow / Liner Brush
One end applies eye shadow to contour the crease of the eye. The other end defines the upper or lower lashes to produce a fine line with either dry or wet eye shadow. 
Also use the fine liner to apply Eyeline Trio.

9. Define Lip Brush
This quality retractable lip brush is essential for any make up purse.

name: Exfoliation Serum - Reveal 30ml
description:
Synergie Skin’s Reveal serum has been specifically formulated to:
• Significantly improve skin texture
• Remove dead surface cells
• Reduce skin discolouration and excess pigmentation
• Decongest skin and improve acne
• Enhance the penetration of other active ingredients of your skin routine (Vitamin A, B and C etc.)
Current medical evidence suggests that AHAs play an important role in:
• Increasing the moisture factors in the skin
• Strengthening the skin’s natural barrier functions
With continued use, Synergie Reveal Serum will promote skin that is softer, smoother, less wrinkled, better hydrated, and more even in skin tone. The other ingredients in Synergie Exfol-X Serum promote the dermal absorption of active ingredients, and reduce inflammation, bacteria and excess pigment.
Apply sparingly on alternate evenings (prior to Vitamin A serum) for general exfoliation. Apply daily (PM) for acne management. Avoid eye area.

name: Essential Brush Kit
description:
The kit contains: 
A mini blusher brush
Eyeliner brush
Brow shaping brush
Dome Eyeshadow crease brush
A concealer brush
Eyeshadow base brush

name: Restore -Pure Squalene Serum 25ml
description:
Synergie Skin Pure Squalene serum, derived from cold pressed organically grown olives, is a 100% pure concentrated extract rich in antioxidants, vitamins and nutrients. It is a powerful and effective skin supplement proven to boost the immune system and help treat all inflammatory skin conditions.
• Following clinical treatments as a natural hydrator (blot skin gently with a tissue before application of mineral makeup) • As a final step in evening moisturisation for all inflammatory skin conditions - Chronically inflamed itchy skin - Chronic skin redness - Dry, irritated skin - Acne

name: BronzeCrush
description:
Used to deepen the tone of your base minerals or as a stand alone product.
Synergie minerals bronzer’s silky sheer formula will give you a luminous glow all year.
Apply with the Kabuki brush.
Available in Medium and Dark.

name: Blush Crush
description: A little goes a long way – just a light sweep of Blushcrush across the apples of the cheeks and a touch on the temples. The concentrated pigment is designed for both shading and highlighting. Available in Soft Apricot and Soft Rose.

name: Redness Correct
description:
The green pigment in Redness Correct perfectly camouflages facial redness. Use with the Synergie small or large concealer brush.
The ideal makeup partner to Synergie Skin Dermacalm Redness Management Formula.

name: Eyeliner Essentials Trio - Jet/Cocco/Midnight
description: No more sharpening pencils. Create a subtle eyeline or dramatic smoky eyes with this revolutionary cream to powder formula. Use the fine angle brush to apply the product along the upper lids, under the eyes and even on the inner rim.

name: Recover - Protective Balm
description:
Synergie Skin’s Recover offers a unique blend of soothing, anti inflammatory ingredients for irritated, inflamed or excessively dry skin.
The potent blend of ingredients is recommended for use following clinical treatments such as microdermabrasion, IPL, Laser, skin rolling (CIT) and chemical peels.
Recover is also recommended for treating inflammatory skin conditions, itchy skin and very dry skin.

name: Redness Management Formular- Dermacalm 30ml
description:
Dermacalm formula has been specifically designed for irritated skin which is prone to redness and flushing. This proprietary blend of active botanicals acts gently and effectively to calm inflamed skin.
May be used AM (prior to sun protection) and PM if needed.

name: GlamourEye Activator
description: Instantly transforms loose eyeshadow into a water resistant eyeliner.

name: Vitalash Mascara (jet)
description: Natural silk fibres thicken and lengthen lashes, while Equisetum extract strengthens from within the follicle. With no tar, artificial colours or petroleum based dyes, this natural formula protects the lashes, decreasing the possibility of premature lash loss. The dual brush thickens and separates lash creating natural volume. Great looking lashes without the harmful additives.

name: Synergie Brushes - Blusher
description: This brush is ideal for application of mineral Blushcrush.

name: Soy Wax Melts
description:
Soy wax melts are a fantastic alternative to oils in oil burners. The soy wax allows for sensational scent throw and is an economical way to enjoy elume's beautiful selection of fragrances.

Conveniently designed to be burned whole in large oil burners, or broken in half for small oil burners, each melt will provide up to 30 hours of home fragrance.

Many Scents to Indulge your senses:

Xmas Christmas Spice-Red
Xmas Vanilla Nutmeg-Cream
Coconut Vanilla Bean-Taupe
Guava & Plum-Purple
Oriental Musk-Pastel Pink
Papaya-Yellow Orange
Spicy Pear-Yellow Green
Wild Ginger-Pale Yellow
Coco Lime-Pale Green
White Orchid-White
Frangipani-Pale Yellow
Lemongrass-Lime Green
Lemon Myrtle-Lemon Yellow
